title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.157 - Governing board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.157 - Governing board

State Regulations

The policy-making board of the hospital. Some of the
responsibilities usually attributed to the governing board may be assumed by
appropriate committees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.157

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
